text:
Tom Natsworthy is the lead protagonist of Philip Reeve's "Mortal Engines Quartet" trilogy.
Role.
In the first novel of the "Mortal Engines Quartet" (known in US as "The Hungry City Chronicles"), "Mortal Engines", he starts with an ordinary teenager who is an apprentice historian.
In other media.
In "Mortal Engines", the film adaptation of the first book, Hester is portrayed by twenty-nine-year-old Irish actor Robert Sheehan as an adult.
